DOC.brief_title: Repaglinide Adolescents With Cystic Fibrosis-Related Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: This study test hypothesis oral repaglinide equivalent insulin treatment new-onset CFRD . This hypothesis test use follow aim : Specific Aim 1 : To determine effect three month repaglinide insulin treatment upon blood glucose ( BG ) insulin excursion oral glucose tolerance test . Specific Aim 2 : To determine effect three month repaglinide insulin treatment upon BG measure continuous glucose monitoring , fast BG , 2-hour post-prandial BG , hemoglobin A1C , serum fructosamine . Secondary Aim 1 : To determine effect three month repaglinide insulin treatment upon weight , body mass index , lean body mass adolescents new-onset CFRD . Secondary Aim 2 : To determine effect three month repaglinide insulin treatment upon pulmonary function adolescent new-onset CFRD . Secondary Aim 3 : To determine effect three month repaglinide insulin treatment upon quality life new-onset CFRD .
